text.section: This section applies only in Carroll County.
There is a Class C (golf course) beer, wine and liquor (on-sale) license.
Subject to the approval of the Board of License Commissioners, the licensee may sell beer, wine and liquor for consumption only on the land and in the buildings which are part of the golf course.
A patron need not be seated to be served.
The hours and days of sale are as specified in § 11-507 of this article.
